markdownRemark.html:
First off, Phoenix LiveView has been a dream to work with so far. I really recommend looking at it for your next web application.

One of the things I love about LiveView is that it enables me to consolidate some of common front-end logic into the backend, where the source of truth belongs. A great example is a form, especially long-running or multi-step forms.

Let me show you what I mean.
